text: Malacoscylus niger is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1908 and is known from Peru.BioLib.cz - Malacoscylus niger. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1908
title: Malacoscylus niger
